name: Hopin
description: Hopiin is the world's first web events platform that allows users to meet their potential match via video speed meeting round-robin.

team.name: Abdulmajid Hamza
team.bioHtml: Experienced Software Developer working with Studio 14. These days I work with React.js, React Native, and Ruby on Rails. Also conversant with many technologies.

jobs.title: Intern
jobs.description:
Hello,
 
We're looking for an intern to join us at Quiin. 
 
Quiin is an online event based dating platform where users can register for events and speed date with other attendees online. We're a friendly/quirky team of three and are planning to launch within the next 2 months.
 
This is a really exciting time with a lot of changes and growth and we're looking for a motivated intern who can champion change looking to gain many skills in different areas of a rapidly growing startup. This opportunity can develop into a full-time role at Quiin.
 
The responsibilities of the job include the following:
* Planning & publishing content across all social platforms, including writing copy on-brand.
* Handling communication with host companies we work with.
* Onboarding new hosts to the platform. 
* Creative decisions on the wording and design of our websites/app.
* Brainstorming creative ideas with the team.
* Engaging new users through different channels.
Interns will be working remotely directly with the team and founder. If you are based in or around London awesome lunch and tea can be provided on the days you work in-person. You will receive training and information about how the platform works and we'll set you up to tackle the various tasks.
 
This is an unpaid, remote position available that includes the potential for a full-time position at an exciting tech startup.
 
Essential skills and qualities:
* Motivated team player
* Good time management
* Able to take direction
* Excellent communication skills
* Comfortable using social media sites e.g. Facebook
* Confident and capable to work independent

Desirable skills and experience:
* English/Writing/Communications/Journalism/Psychology major preferred but all qualifications are encouraged to apply.
* Proficiency at using a photo editing software.
* Experience/awareness of dating apps (Tinder, Hinge, Bumble).
